org.owasp.dependencycheck.data.nsp

Class NspSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.owasp.dependencycheck.data.nsp.NspSearch

public class NspSearch
extends Object
    Class of methods to search via Node Security Platform.
    Author:
    Steve Springett

      Creates a NspSearch for the given repository URL.

      List<Advisory> submitPackage(javax.json.JsonObject packageJson)

    • Constructor Detail

      • NspSearch

        public NspSearch(Settings settings)
          throws MalformedURLException
        Creates a NspSearch for the given repository URL.
        Parameters:
        settings - the configured settings
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - thrown if the configured URL is invalid

    • Method Detail

      • submitPackage

        public List<Advisory> submitPackage(javax.json.JsonObject packageJson)
                             throws AnalysisException,
                                    IOException
        Submits the package.json file to the NSP public /check API and returns a list of zero or more Advisories.
        Parameters:
        packageJson - the package.json file retrieved from the Dependency
        Returns:
        a List of zero or more Advisory object
        Throws:
        AnalysisException - if Node Security Platform is unable to analyze the package
        IOException - if it's unable to connect to Node Security Platform
